title: Who owns the abandoned house on Harris Rd?   This house has been abandoned for 10 years or more and is an eyesore.
text:
According to the county's property records, the house at 525 Harris
Road is owned by John Terry of Bullock, N.C. and it is valued at
$78,742.

Here are a couple of links that might help if you have questions:



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=18

http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4059
